name: io.github.ertugrulakben/dep-oracle
description: Predictive dependency security engine. Trust scores, zombie detection, blast radius analysis, typosquat detection, trend prediction, and migration advisor for your supply chain dependencies.

tools.name: dep_oracle_scan
tools.description: Scan a project's dependency tree and generate trust scores for all packages. Returns critical, warning, and safe dependency counts with detailed metrics.

tools.name: dep_oracle_trust_score
tools.description: Get the trust score (0-100) for a single package. Evaluates security history, maintainer health, activity, popularity, funding, and license.

tools.name: dep_oracle_blast_radius
tools.description: Analyze the blast radius of a dependency — how many files and other packages would be affected if it were compromised.

tools.name: dep_oracle_zombies
tools.description: List all zombie dependencies in a project — packages with no commits, releases, or maintenance activity in 12+ months.

tools.name: dep_oracle_suggest_migration
tools.description: Get safer alternative package suggestions for a given dependency. Covers 131 packages with 192 curated alternatives including difficulty ratings.
